DataTables example InputPaging feature plugin

The InputPaging plugin for DataTables which adds a feature to DataTables for use in the layout option. The inputPaging feature provides the ability to show a paging control with an input element that will show the current page and also allow the end user to type in the page number they want to view.

Examples

  • Basic example

Please refer to the DataTables documentation for full information about its API properties and methods.
Additionally, there are a wide range of extensions and plug-ins which extend the capabilities of DataTables.
